# token

**Instance Property**

The encrypted payment information.

## Declaration

```swift
var token: PKPaymentToken { get }
```

## Discussion

For more information about the payment data structure, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/payment-token-format-reference].

## Working with the payment token

- **PKPaymentToken**: Contains the user’s payment credentials.
